**The Qingwei Zhai Method**
*Sutra Title:* *Qingwei Zhai Method*. Author unknown. Two fascicles.
*Source Text:* *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, Methods Category.

**Fascicle One of the Qingwei Zhai Method**

**Lineage of the Daoist Tradition**
The Primordial Heavenly King of the Origin.
"Origin" is the supreme appellation of the Ultimate Dao, the root of all ways. Vast and flourishing in emptiness, he first unfolded the celestial charts and presided over the Imperial Dawn. In the Jade Capital of the Mystic Capital Mountain, within the Celestial Palace of the Pure Tenuity Heaven, during the Dragon Han Kalpa, he ascended the Precious Terrace of the Great Mystery, the Hall of Luminous Mystery and Primordial Radiance, where he transmitted the Dao of Pure Tenuity and Wondrous Mystery to the Jade Sovereign Dao Lord, and the Jade Tablet of Cyclical Response from the Supreme Lord Lao to the Mystic Capital.

**The Jade Sovereign Dao Lord**
He is the ancestral founder of the Lingbao Imperial Honored One before the establishment of the ancient kalpas, the origin of the Great Primordial’s generation and transformation. Fusing and coalescing the myriad forms, his brilliance shines resplendent. He resides in the Jade Capital Mountain of the Great Mystery Heaven, within the Celestial Palace of the Yu Yu Heaven. With his wondrous qi of ultimate mystery, he transmitted the Jade Formula of Pure Tenuity and Penetrating Reality to the Heavenly Emperor of True Primordial and Wondrous Transformation, and the Precious Chapters of the Flying Mystery Mechanism to the Heavenly Emperor of the Purple Tenuity and Great Florescence.

**The Heavenly Emperor of True Primordial and Wondrous Transformation**, personal name Yi Hui.
He is the sovereign of the Heaven of Wondrous Transformation, residing in the Palace of Wondrous Treasure Transformation, also known as the Palace of the Myriad Spirits of the Origin.

**The Jade Clarity Illustrious August Dao Lord**, personal name Bang Xu.
He is the Grand Dharma Master of the Mystic Center among the Supreme Immortals and Perfected Ones, presiding over the affairs of the Celestial Pivot Ministry.

**The Perfected One of the Great Mystery and Primordial Unity**, personal name Yu Luo Qiao, also known as Lang Yun Qi.
He is the Heavenly Lord of the Wondrous Dao of Jade Clarity, dwelling in the Dragon Brahma Palace with the Chapters of the Jade Terrace Summoning Spirits. He presides over the Hall of Cyclical Response in the Mystic Capital, also known as the Palace of the Golden Mystery and Primordial Radiance.

**The Perfected One of the Great Mystery and Second Unity**, personal name Guang Miao Yin, also known as Jue Zhen Xuan.
He is the Heavenly Lord of the Wondrous Transformation of Supreme Clarity, residing in the Palace of Universal Illumination with the Inner Methods of the Divine Immortals of the Wondrous Dao. He presides over the Hall of Ancestral Former Ages in the Mystic Capital, also known as the Palace of the Venerable Chapters of Wondrous Transformation.

**The Perfected One of the Great Mystery and Third Unity**, personal name Zhen Ding Guang, also known as Zhe Xi Yuan.
He is the Heavenly Lord of the Wondrous Response of Supreme Clarity, dwelling in the Palace of Vast Clarity with the Pivotal Essentials of the Illuminating Dao and Cyclical Transformation. He presides over the Hall of Proper Prosperity in the Mystic Capital, also known as the Palace of the Venerable Extension of Wondrous Response.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Great Mystery of Pure Tenuity and Penetrating Radiance**, personal name Qiong Hong.
He resides in the Palace of Penetrating Primordial Radiance of Jade Clarity.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Vast Spirit and Primordial Transformation of the Mystic Cavern**, personal name Fu Gao Yun.
He resides in the Palace of Primordial Transformation of Supreme Clarity, also known as the Palace of the Mystic Cavern and Primordial Transformation.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Divine Brilliance and Primordial Unity of Cinnabar Firmness**, personal name Bing Yu.
He resides in the Palace of the Divine Cinnabar of the Jade Capital, also known as the Palace of Primordial Unity.

**The August Emperor of the Total Dao of the Level Heaven of Pure Tenuity**, Zhu Chang Xing.
He resides in the Central Palace of Stabilizing Vastness.

**The Radiant August Emperor of the Yang Brilliance of the Mystic Cavern of Pure Tenuity**, personal name Wan Du.
A transformation body of the Celestial Officials, he resides in the Palace of Primordial Yang.

**The Heavenly Mysterious Supreme Thearch of Illuminating Clarity and Manifest Efficacy**, Kang Wan Chen.
He resides in the Palace of Supreme Clarity in the Celestial Ministry.

**The August Lord of the Venerable Mystery and Wondrous Response of the Great Tenuity’s Evolutionary Transformation**, Duan Bei Liang.
He resides in the Palace of the Evolutionary Perfection of the Great Tenuity.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Floating Brilliance and Illuminating Reality of the Mystic Cavern**, Long Chong Yi.
He resides in the Palace of the Mystic Tiger.

**The Perfected Lord of Vast Transformation and Majestic Radiance, Storing Blessings in the Celestial Ministry**, Xu Zhao Li.
He presides over the Hall of Scenic Destiny in the Celestial Ministry, also known as the Hall of Transformative Destiny in the Celestial Ministry.

**The Supreme Sage Perfected Lord of Vast Spirit and Revolving Transformation, Storing Blessings in the Celestial Ministry**, Zhao Shun.
He presides over the Hall of Stored Blessings in the Celestial Ministry.

**The Perfected Lord of the Great Mound of Cinnabar Radiance and Primordial Harmony Ascending Heaven**, Zhang Kong Shi, also known as the Holy Mother of the Primordial Reverence of the Nine Heavens.
She resides in the Palace of the Primordial Spirit of the Nine Heavens.

**The Perfected Lord of the Nine Heavens’ Primordial Harmony, Illuminating Dao, Flying Thunder, and Lightning Transformation**, Bu Chao Zu, also known as the True Consort of the Supreme Spirit of the Nine Heavens.
She resides in the Central Palace of Stabilizing Blessings in the Nine Heavens.

**The Celestial Official of the Floating Brilliance of the Southern Mound**, personal name Lang Qi.
During the Tang dynasty, he descended in the Western Capital, presiding over the Palace of Floating Brilliance in the Southern Culmen.

**The Heavenly Lord of the Returning Brilliance of the Mystic Cavern and Blazing Clarity**, personal name Fu Yi.
He presides over the Palace of Blazing Clarity in the Yang Cavern.

**The Divine King of the Solar Valley of Radiant Yang**, personal name Ji Zhong.
He resides at the Altar of the Solar Valley beneath the Mulberry Grove.

**The Sagely Mother of the Jade Immortals and Nine Perfected Ones of Myriad Transformations**, the Primordial Lady of Supreme Simplicity, Shi Jie Zhao.
She resides in the Palace of Illuminating Clarity atop the Mountain of Mystic Radiance in the Jade Western Terrace, presiding over the Palace of Blessings and Origins on Mount Wu.

**The Perfected Lord of the Golden Mystery and Cyclical Response of Primordial Radiance in the Mystic Cavern**, Hui.
He presides over the Palace of Preserving Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Wondrous Response of Cloud-Transforming Brilliance and Evolutionary Radiance**, Xuan.
He presides over the Palace of the Numinous Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Venerable Transformation of the Dao’s Radiance and Vast Kindness**, Xu.
He presides over the Palace of the Supreme Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Primordial Unity of Congealing Clouds and Prosperous Clarity**, Hong.
He presides over the Palace of the Total Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Mystic Prosperity and Numinous Transformation of the Dragon Brilliance and Harmonious Radiance**, Hong.
He presides over the Palace of the Cloud Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Returning Brilliance of the Radiant Clouds and Grand Harmony of the True Unity**, Mo.
He presides over the Palace of the Majestic Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Transformative Forms and Illuminating Clarity of the Vast Mystery**, Shu.
He presides over the Palace of the Embracing Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Cinnabar Firmness and Mystic Harmony of the Vermilion Mound**, Piao.
She presides over the Palace of the Primordial Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Self-Illuminating Spirit and Blending Radiance of the Purple Numinosity**, Guan.
She presides over the Palace of the Dao Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Illuminating Brilliance of the Empty Silence and Brahma Radiance**, Hui.
She presides over the Palace of Nurturing Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Vast Illumination of Flourishing Growth and Venerable Clarity**, Sui.
He presides over the Palace of the Lofty Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Illuminating Harmony and Mystic Clarity of the Mystic Capital**, Guo Qin, also known as the Mysterious Woman of the Nine Heavens.
She presides over the Palace of the Primordial Radiance of the Mystic Dawn.

**The Perfected Lord of the Vast Illumination and Mystic Clarity of Pure Tenuity**, Fu Hui Qi.
She presides over the Palace of the Vast Illumination of the Jade Capital.

**The Perfected Lord of the Illuminating Cyclical Response of the Great Florescence of Pure Tenuity**, Han Jun.
She resides in the Palace of the Dao and Primordial Radiance of the Great Florescence.

**The Perfected Lord of the Nine Radiant Spirits and Natural Mystic Illumination**, Yang Xi.
A native of Youzhou, he presides over the Palace of the Numinous Cyclical Radiance.

**The Perfected Lord of the Purple Clarity, Golden Radiance, and Stored Blessings, Fond of the Dao**, Shen Zong Qing.
A native of Qi, she presides over the Palace of the Purple Primordial and Blessed Florescence.

**The Perfected Lord of the Purple Radiance, Cinnabar Brilliance, Thunder’s Roar, and Lightning’s Flash**, Su Gang.
She presides over the Palace of the Purple Radiance and Thunder’s Clarity.

**The Perfected Lord of the Flourishing Prosperity and Natural Cyclical Transformation of the Great Unity**, Guan Fang Zhong.
A native of the Eastern Capital, he presides over the Palace of the Illuminating Communication of the Great Unity.

**The Perfected Lord of the Ancestral Prosperity and Blessed Origins**, Yao Yu.
She presides over the Palace of the Mystic Clarity and Ancestral Blessings.

**The Jade Numinosity and Cinnabar Firmness of the Protecting Clarity Consort, the Radiant Purple Brilliance of the Dao Lord**, Wang Shuo, styled Jue.
A native of Nanjing, she is the Sagely Mother of Mystic Radiance, presiding over the affairs of the Four Seas. During the Tang dynasty, she descended to reside in the Palace of Scenic Clarity in the Eastern Sea, presiding over the Palace of the Primordial Mystery of the Western Florescence.

**The Grand Clarity and Supreme Mystery Perfected Lord**, Wen Yong.
He presides over the Palace of Scenic Brilliance and Grand Harmony, conferring upon the Ancestral Perfected Lord.

**The Numinous Treasure Flowing Lineage, the Jade Celestial Dao Lord**.

**The Purple Celestial and Grand Florescence Heavenly Emperor**, named Zong Chang.
He is the Heavenly King of Mount Taihua, presiding over the Capital of the Grand Tenuity and the Palace of Florescence Brilliance.

**The Eastern Florescence Controller of Destiny, the Azure Lad Dao Lord**, named Aluoluo.
He is the Eastern Florescence Wood Duke, residing in the Fangzhu Palace and overseeing the registers of the divine immortals’ Dao.

**The Three Heavens Manifesting Dao and Ordinances Heavenly Emperor**, Fang Shisu.
He is the Azure Numinosity and Primordial Elder, presiding over the Jade Heavenly Ordinance and Primordial Palace.

**The Grand Possession, Wondrous Mystery, and Unfathomable Dao of the Natural Heavenly Emperor**, Dong Hou.
He is the first star preceding the Eastern Dipper, presiding over the Palace of Grand Possession and Unfathomable Illumination.

**The Purple Tenuity, Ninefold Illumination, and Soaring Mystery of the Inner Transformation Heavenly Emperor**, Gao Yingze.
A native of Caizhou, he resides in the Southern Sea and presides over the Ninefold Illumination and Firm Vastness Mansion.

**The Supreme Numinosity, Cavernous Brilliance, and Universally Illuminating Heavenly Emperor**, Gong Zongqing.
He presides over the Mansion of Circulating Essence.

**The Cavernous Clarity Perfected of the Western Citadel**, Wang Bao.
He is the Supreme Minister of the Golden Portal, presiding over the Left Mansion of the Golden Portal and Prosperous Florescence Palace, as well as the Western Citadel’s Assembly of All Heroes.

**The Perfected of the Assembly of All Truths**, Wang Yuan, styled Fangping.
He is the Lesser Cavern Heaven, residing in the Palace of Illuminating Cultivation and Transmitting Brilliance, as well as the Pure Harmony and Primordial Yang Mansion.

**The Highest Clarity, Purple Void, and Numinous Illumination Perfected Lady of the Purple Radiance**, Wei Huacun, styled Xian’an.
A native of the Jin dynasty and daughter of Wei Shu, she presides over the Golden Portal’s Purple Chapters and Cinnabar Assembly Mansion, residing in the Palace of Highest Clarity and Numinous Illumination, as well as the Grand Cinnabar Palace.

**The Transformative Mechanism of Form and the Purple Brilliance of Peaceful Clarity Perfected Lady**, Ouyang Changsheng.
A native of Fengxiang Prefecture, she presides over the Palace of Peaceful Clarity.

**The Purple Vastness, Circulating Zhou, Ascending Harmony, and Pure Mystery Perfected Lady**, Tang Zongchao.
A native of Zizhou, she presides over the Mansion of Divine Continent’s Tumulus Brilliance.

**The Treasured Blessings, Preserving Fortune, Cavernous Brilliance, and Ancestral Illumination Perfected Lady**, Long Yan.
A native of Daozhou, she presides over the Heavenly Mountain’s Primordial Illumination Mansion.

**The Nine Heavens, Divine Vastness, Illuminating Clarity, and Expansive Unfathomable Perfected Lord**, Lin Changqing.
A native of Daming Prefecture, he presides over the Expansive Unfathomable Mansion.

**The Heavenly Florescence, Unfathomable Numinosity, Purple Numinosity, and Florescence Yang of the Mysterious Response Perfected Lord**, Chen Huanran.
A native of Pengzhou, he presides over the Heavenly Florescence and Unfathomable Numinosity Mansion.

**The Supreme Clarity, Mysterious Brilliance, and Floating Hill Perfected Lord of Merit**, Xi.
He presides over the Purple Clarity Mansion.

**The Unfathomable Harmony, Supreme Mystery, and Cavernous Numinosity of the Heavenly Primordial Perfected Lord**, Zhang Rentong.
A native of Shouzhou, he presides over the Harmony and Numinosity Mansion.

**The Purple Sovereign, Unfathomable Numinosity, Supreme Clarity, and Inner Mystery Perfected Lady**, Zhu Qinxian.
A native of Qiongzhou, she presides over the Purple Sovereign’s Preserving Life Mansion.

**The Dragon Brilliance, Universally Illuminating, and Cavernous Florescence Perfected Lady**, Wang Shudao.
A native of Hanzhou, she resides in the Cavernous Florescence Palace.

**The Nine Heavens and Cavernous Clarity Perfected Lady**, Xu Lingqing.
She descended in Qin to Jianzhou, presiding over the Nine Heavens’ Cavernous Clarity and Mysterious Cultivation Palace.

**The Nine Heavens, Majestic Mystery, Supreme Clarity, and Harmonious Communication Perfected Lady**, Yu Guo.
A native of Ezhou, she presides over the Nine Heavens’ Supreme Clarity Mansion.

**The Nine Heavens’ Wondrous Dao and True Circulation Perfected Lady**, Yang Che.
She descended in Qin to the Pivot of Hezhong Prefecture, commanding thunder and lightning as her generals, and presides over the Nine Heavens’ Eternal Plain Palace.

**The Unfathomable Mystery, Cinnabar Transformation, Mysterious Harmony, and Natural Perfected Lady**, Liu Chongzhong.
A native of Zhuyajun, she presides over the Nine Dragons’ Cinnabar Harmony Palace.

**The Purple Tenuity, Rosy Brilliance, Wondrous Perception, and Cavernous Radiance Perfected Lady**, Song Xixian.
A native of Guangzhou, she presides over the Rosy Brilliance and Illuminating Excellence Mansion, residing on Southern Li Nong Mountain.

**The Jade Hall Perfected**, Zhu Xuan.
A native of the Eastern Capital, he presides over the Grand Clarity Palace’s Phoenix Pavilion and the Mysterious Numinosity Palace, residing on Golden Florescence Mountain.

**The Fragrant Florescence and Scenic Grove Perfected**, Yang Maozhong.
A native of the Western Capital, he presides over the Scenic Grove and Primordial Prosperity Mansion, residing on Eastern Sea Mountain.

**The Azure Wisdom, Illuminating Transformation, and Fusang Perfected Lord**, Bu Ji.
A native of Suizhou, he presides over the Illuminating Numinosity Mansion, residing among the Horn and Neck stars.

**The Eastern Florescence, Supreme Assistant, Controller of Destiny Perfected**, Yang Xihe.
He presides over the Cavernous Yang’s Upright Numinosity Right Mansion, as well as the Eastern Florescence Controller of Destiny Mansion.

**The Eastern Florescence, Supreme Minister, Supreme Clarity Immortal Elder**, Xu Hui.
He presides over the Purple Yang’s Ultimate Mystery Palace.

**The Purple Numinosity, Wondrous Dao, Blazing Clarity, and Cavernous Brilliance Perfected Lady**, Xie Jingang.
She presides over the Purple Numinosity and Heavenly Transformation Mansion.

**The Cavernous Truth and Myriad Blessings Perfected Lady**, Ji Shizheng.
She presides over the Grand Void and Cavernous Clarity Palace.

**The Supreme Clarity Perfected Lady and Western Florescence Sagely Mother**, Chen Ying.
Early enrolled in the immortal registers, she expounded the teachings of the Filial Dao and Luminous King, presiding over the Cinnabar Yang and Forgiving Brilliance Palace, manifesting under various surnames.

**The Highest Clarity Grand Envoy and Heavenly Mechanism Inner Minister**, Xu Xun.
Having received the Jade Chapters of the Supreme Clarity from the Sagely Mother Chen, he attained the Dao on the fifteenth day of the eighth month and ascended with his household. He presides over the Heavenly Mechanism Bureau, residing in the Jade Capital’s Pure Celebration Palace. A native of Hongzhou, his full biography is recorded elsewhere.

**The Ancestral Perfected Lord**.

**The Lineage of the Dao and Virtue**:
**The Supreme Lord Lao**.
He is the Dao and Virtue’s Ultimate Veneration, the progenitor of the myriad methods, born of primordial qi, whose merits are beyond naming. He resides in the Grand Luo’s Golden Florescence Mountain and Great Crimson Heavenly Palace. Manifesting to cross barriers, he conferred the *Scripture of the Unfathomable Circulation of the Pure Subtlety* upon the Worthy Master of Literary Beginnings, the Pass Keeper Perfected.

**The Pass Keeper Perfected**, surnamed Yin, named Xi.
His writings circulated in the world. Foreseeing the auspicious unfolding of purple qi, he encountered an ox-cart and personally transmitted the mysterious wonders. He presides over the Great Pivot’s Central Palace.

**The Grand Clarity, Pure Wisdom Perfected**, Shi Fu.
He is the Eastern Florescence Emperor’s manifestation, born in Hanzhou, presiding over the Dragon Mound Mountain’s Cavern of Illuminating Communication, located on the Eastern Sea’s Broad Mulberry Mountain, as well as the August Clarity Mansion.

**The Western Florescence, Illuminating Communication Perfected Lady**, Pang Qiaodao.
A native of Gengchu Township, Mianzhu County, Hanzhou, she presides over the Western Florescence’s Broad Sagacity Palace.

**The Primordial Numinosity, Vast Mystery, Dao of Wondrous Attitude, and Harmonious Communication Perfected Lady**, Shang Zhu.
A native of Pengzhou, she presides over the Cloud Yang Mansion.

**The Azure Numinosity, Vast Sagacity, Vast Numinosity, and Majestic Numinosity Perfected Lady**, Zhong Yuangui.
A native of Qingzhou, she presides over the Heavenly Prosperity Mansion.

**The Grand Rosy Brilliance, Heavenly Veneration, Dao Transformation Perfected Lady**, Yue Ji.
A native of Nanjing, she presides over the Venerating Brilliance Mansion.

**The Illuminating Harmony, Pure Numinosity, and Manifesting Clarity of the Mysterious Perfected**, Xu Zizhong.
A native of Hengzhou, he presides over the Illuminating Unity Mansion.

**The Grand Mystery Perfected**, Zhao Shouzhen, also Chen Gong.
A native of Suzhou, he presides over the Grand Mystery’s Pure Clarity Palace and Supreme Primordial Mansion.

**The Heavenly Mountain Perfected**, Hong Bin, also Xiao Liu.
A native of Yongzhou, he presides over the Heavenly Unity’s Supreme Yang Palace and Heavenly Grace Mansion.

**The Supreme Mystery Perfected**, Lu Huiyuan.
A native of Dengzhou, he presides over the Cavernous Mystery’s Protecting Perfection Palace.

**The Supreme Ultimate’s Left Palace Immortal Elder, Impulse-Responding Blessing-Fostering Perfected Lord**, Ge Xuan, styled Xiaoxian.
A native of Yue, he cultivated and attained the Dao, ascending as the Supreme Ultimate’s Inner Minister, presiding over the Supreme Ultimate’s Numinous Court Palace.

**The Supreme Ultimate’s Celebrating Harmony, Northern Numinosity’s Inner Assistant Perfected**, Zheng Siyuan.
Presiding over the Celebrating Harmony’s Primordial Impulse Mansion, residing in the Thunderous Radiance’s Yang Palace.

**The Ancestral Perfected Lady**.

**The Orthodox Unity Lineage**
The Most High Lord Lao bestowed upon **The Three Heavens’ Sagely Master, Supreme Mystery’s Prime Minister Perfected Lord**, surnamed Zhang, named Daoling.
A native of Wu, born on the fifteenth day of the first lunar month on Mount Tianmu, he served the Han as a Minister of State before relinquishing office to attain the Dao. Presiding over the Supreme Mystery’s Capital Province, residing in the Primordial Essence’s Primordial Brilliance Mansion, he transmitted the teachings to his descendants.

**The Grand Clarity’s Perfected, Successor Master Lord**, Zhang Heng, served the Han as a Palace Attendant and was the Sagely Master’s son.

**The Grand Clarity’s Perfected, Lineage Master Lord**, Zhang Lu, served the Han as Marquis of Langzhong and was the Palace Attendant’s eldest son.

**The Supreme Mystery’s Sagely Mother, Female Master Lord**, Zhang Wenji.
The Sagely Master’s daughter, she and her family together attained the wondrous Dao and ascended as a whole.

**The Grand Harmony’s Reliant Mystery Perfected Lady**, Song Yicheng.
A native of the Western Capital of the Eastern Han, she expounded the Three Heavens’ teachings and presided over the Flourishing Transformation Mansion.

**The Luminous Dao of the Azure Mystery’s Cavernous Mystery, Treasure Balance’s Purple Brilliance, Primordial Harmony’s Radiant Dao, Supreme Unity’s Divine Effulgence Perfected Lady**, Wang Zhenghong.
Residing beneath the Purple Radiance Palace Gate to the right of the Supreme Impulse Tower in the Mysterious Capital.

**The Azure Mystery’s Flourishing Dawn, Protecting Fortune’s Golden Brilliance Perfected Lady**, Peng Hanyuan.
Residing in the Cinnabar Brilliance Mansion of the Well and Ghost Stars, she commands the Cinnabar Brilliance’s wind, fire, and thunder as their Thunder Marshal.

**The Divine Effulgence’s Protecting Heaven, Dao-Transforming Perfected Lady**, Guang Rong.
A native of Fengzhou, she presides over the Divine Effulgence Mansion and governs the immortals of the seas.

**The Wisdom Terrace’s Left Assistant, Perfected of White’s Natural Penetrating Wondrous Mystery Perfected Lady**, Weng Jian.
A native of the Eastern Capital, she presides over the Central Pure Numinous Perfection Mansion.

**The Purple Tenuity’s Governor of All Perfected Perfected Lady**, Liang Fu.
A native of Huizhou, she presides over the Perfected Harmony Mansion.

**The Grand Flower’s Controller of Destiny, Flowing Metal’s Flying Radiance, Cinnabar Rosy Clouds Perfected**, Zhu Andao.
The Cavernous Mystery’s Divine and Fierce Perfected Lord, presiding over the Venerating Rosy Clouds Palace.

**The Grand Harmony’s Illuminating Unity Perfected**, Qiu Liangsuo.
A native of Zizhou, he presides over the Illuminating Yang’s Radiant Primordial Mansion.

**The Supreme Clarity’s Wondrous Dao, Flourishing Fortune’s Lineage-Source Perfected**, Lin Zirong.
A native of Yuezhou, he presides over the Source Flourishing Mansion.

**The Numinous Mystery’s Harmonizing Congealment Perfected Lady**, Xu Dong.
A native of Pengzhou of the Eastern Han, she presides over the Jade Harmony Mansion and later became a Thunder Marshal, manifesting countless numinous marvels.

**The Jade Pupil’s Numinous Radiance, Sagely Mother, Supreme Primordial Perfected Lady**, Zhu Heng.
A native of Guiyang Prefecture, she presides over the Purple Radiance’s Numinous Response Palace and the Numinous Radiance’s Penetrating Transformation Mansion.

**The Ancestral Perfected Lady**.

**The Four Lineages’ Convergence**
**The Golden Watchtower’s Illuminating Congealment, Cavernous Clarity’s Bright Dao, Protecting Immortals’ Penetrating Transformation Perfected Lady of the Azure Mystery’s Primordial Supreme Attendant**, Shu Zu, also Suidao, styled Fangzhong.
A native of Lingling Prefecture, the Perfected Lady devoted herself to cultivation, paying homage to Perfected Lord Xu, Perfected Zheng, and the Sagely Mother of Numinous Radiance. Once, by the Divine Transformation Stream in the Cavernous Emptiness Grotto of the Western Capital, she encountered the Grand Clarity’s Supreme Mystery Primordial Perfected Lady descending upon the stream’s bank. Marveling at this, the Perfected Lady approached to pay her respects. Together they entered the grotto, where she was bestowed the Primordial Beginning’s Great Dao. Instructed to ride a withered tree and drift with the current, she soon found the tree restored to its original place, the celestial being vanished without a trace. The Perfected Lady thereby unified the four lineages into one. Later, she resided in the Golden Watchtower’s Illuminating Brilliance Palace, presiding over the Cavernous Illumination Mansion, the Golden Watchtower’s Illuminating Dao Palace atop Mount Linong, and the Golden Watchtower’s Central Numinous Congealment Illumination Mansion.

**The Jasper Chamber’s Inner Response, Cavernous Clarity’s Supreme Effulgence Perfected Lady**, Guo Yulong.
A native of the capital, she served as the Azure Mystery’s Supreme Radiance Attendant, presiding over the Purple Clarity Mansion and the Cavernous Clarity Mansion.

**The Purple Radiance’s Illuminating Perfected, Blessing Harmony Perfected Lady**, Fu Yangyu, styled Zifang.
The Three Heavens’ Supreme Assistant, residing in the Flourishing Brilliance Mansion of Mount Linong, and also said to dwell on the Oceanic Peaks’ Grand Flower Mountain, presiding over the Dragon Radiance Mansion.

**The Dragon Radiance’s Dao Illumination Perfected Lady**, Yao Zhuang, styled Shuqi.
A native of the Western Capital, also titled the Vast Prosperity Perfected Lady. The Three Heavens’ Scripture Attendant, residing in the Vast Mulberry’s Harmonious Impulse Palace, presiding over the Prosperous Blessing Mansion, traveling between two or three abodes.

**The Celestial Clarity’s Wondrous Transformation, Purple Essence’s Jade Brilliance Perfected Lady**, Gao Shuang.
Residing at the mouth of Weishan Valley in Yanjing, she served as the Three Heavens’ Attendant, presiding over the Vast Mulberry Mountain’s Cavernous Radiance Prosperity Mansion and the Jade Brilliance’s Illuminating Congealment Mansion, with three dwelling places.

**The Meritorious August Numinous Lady**, Quan Mao.
The Harmonious Yang’s Perfected Attendant, presiding over the Harmonious Yang Palace.

**The Western Flower’s Pure Emptiness Perfected**, Hua Ying.
A native of Fengxiang Prefecture, born on the third day of the first lunar month, she served as the Cavernous Yang’s Supreme Minister of the Azure Mystery’s Illuminating Primordial Immortal Court, residing on Mount Western Flower.

**The Green City’s Penetrating Blessing Perfected**, Zhu Dongyuan.
A native of Chengdu, born on the first day of the second lunar month, he served as the Divine Empyrean’s Jade Pivot Envoy of the Azure Mystery’s Cavernous Guard Supreme Minister, secluded on Mount Green City.

**The Cloud Mountain’s Preserving Unity Perfected**, Li Shaowei.
A native of Fangzhou, born on the fifth day of the third lunar month, he served as the Five Thunders’ Institute Envoy of the Azure Mystery’s Capital Primordial Right Minister, secluded on Mount Green City.

**The Eyebrow Mountain’s Reclusive Perfected**, Nan Bidao, styled Douwen.
The Azure Mystery’s Preserving Primordial Immortal Minister, a native of Meizhou, born at the hour of Yin on the third day of the eleventh lunar month in the Bingchen year in Meishan. Indifferent to fame and profit, his learning bridged heaven and humanity. Serving the Song, he rose to the position of Guangxi’s Provincial Governor. Once, he encountered the Preserving Unity Perfected, who bestowed upon him the Supreme Dao, enabling him to command spirits and deities. One day, a crimson-robed official descended into his courtyard and addressed the Perfected: "The Emperor has heard of your name and now appoints you as the Six Penetrations’ Controller of Waters in the Dipper. You are to propagate the mysterious teachings and broadly deliver living beings. When your merit is complete, you shall be summoned back to the Golden Watchtower." With these words, the crimson-robed official ascended into the sky. He secluded himself on Mount Green City.

**The Azure Waters’ Thunder Abyss Perfected**, Huang Shunshen, styled Huibo.
A native of Jianning, born at the hour of Wei on the fifth day of the intercalary eighth lunar month in the Jiachen year. Precociously intelligent, he perused all books of the Three Teachings and Nine Schools. While accompanying his father on official duties in Guangxi, the Provincial Governor, the Reclusive Perfected of Eyebrow Mountain, saw him and marveled, entrusting him with all his writings.

The Master delved into mysteries and probed profundities, compiling them into a comprehensive compendium. Scholars flocked to his gate, their caps and carriages like clouds. Later, he was summoned to court, then received the imperial decree to return to the mountains. He secluded himself upon Purple Radiance Isle, becoming the preeminent master of his age.

**On Daoist Practices and Resolving Doubts**
Daoist cultivation is akin to the Confucian study of investigating things. For in practice, rectifying the mind and sincerity of intent are paramount. If the mind is not rectified, it cannot move things; if intent is not sincere, it cannot communicate with spirits. When spirit operates here, things respond there. Thus, though separated by a thousand miles, one may breathe as if face-to-face—who but the utterly sincere can achieve this?

Alas! Vast and boundless is the mind; subtly interconnected is the spirit. Yet if the mind is not preserved, it remains unclear; if the spirit is not nurtured, it lacks efficacy. Only through long preservation does clarity arise; only through long nurturance does efficacy manifest. Scholars of this world, neglecting daily cultivation, rush to act in a single moment—like drawing sweet water from a dry well or plucking rare blossoms from withered wood. I see they shall not succeed. When their qi is exhausted and their spirit startled, inviting scorn and disdain, they then blame the spirit’s inefficacy or the method’s failure—how lamentable!

Some masters, failing to grasp these profound mysteries, cling to the notion that rituals and sacrifices alone invoke efficacy, thereby misleading later generations. Consequently, disciples focus solely on offerings and sacrifices, harming creatures and wasting life. They summon wandering, food-seeking ghosts, whose numbers grow daily, forming factions. Claiming to command and control spirits at will, they do not realize that using evil to attack evil truly harms the practitioner’s own body.

From my youth, I cherished cultivation, collecting several chests of ritual texts and hundreds of seals, believing these were the extent of the methods. Yet my resolve was firm, and Heaven guided my heart. Suddenly, I encountered a perfected one who transmitted oral instructions—no more than a few phrases—and I roamed freely among all methods. Only then did I realize that generals and officials reside within the body, and the divine does not depart from the square inch of the heart. Those of noble aspirations who earnestly seek the Dao and its methods must not be ignorant of this principle.

**Form of the Blue Petition**
During the Tianbao era of the Tang, wooden prayer tablets were replaced with plain petitions written on paper.
In the reign of Emperor Zhenzong of the Song, blue paper was adopted, hence the name "Blue Petition."
The significance of the pure and the blue—both rooted in primal origins—must not be overlooked.

The text of such petitions should not exceed sixty or seventy characters,
and phrases like "I humbly reflect" or "prostrating in thought" are not to be used.
This is the standard format for memorials, strict and solemn.
The petition should first state the aspiration, then directly present the matter at hand.
Parallel phrasing and couplets are to be avoided,
for while they may ease recitation, they obscure the meaning of the text.
Moreover, parallelism often leads to redundancy, compromising concision and clarity.

The principle states:
The form of a petition should be substantive rather than ornate,
unadorned rather than refined,
plain rather than florid,
true rather than false,
direct rather than circuitous,
persuasive rather than verbose,
modest rather than coarse,
pure rather than turbid,
upright rather than deviant.
Concise and sincere, it may then move heaven and earth,
stir gods and spirits,
ascend directly to the celestial bureaus,
and elicit an immediate response.

Those who violate this shall be held accountable by the officials of the Bureau of Transgressions and the Enforcers of the Law.

**On Tablets and Registers**
The merits of tablets and registers extend even to the netherworld, though they cannot be fully recounted. The case of Zhang Lihua stands as particularly luminous evidence. Records state: upon reciting the scripture nine times—precisely at the moment of repentance—one ignites the tablet and memorial, confirming that the submission of the tablet should occur at the culmination of the meritorious deed.

Recently, some have taken to burning the *Salvation from Suffering* talisman at the outset of the memorial, believing this liberates the deceased from hell. Yet this is unsound. For the extraction of the soul has its own documents, and the white tablet should be proclaimed at the time of transmission, allowing the deceased to ride the power of the ritual’s merits, the vows, the precepts, and the repentance for renewal. Only then, after offering the tablet and proclaiming below, are the sins pardoned and grievances released by the Ten Directions, enabling true liberation from hell and ascent to the Vermilion Palace.

Thus the scripture states: *"When the beings of the Nine Dark Hells hear the Northern Emperor’s broad entreaty, their hearts generate remorse and they seek deliverance. Only then does the Heavenly Worthy expound the precepts and bestow the talisman."* This is especially reliable.

Moreover, reciting and inscribing talismans is no arduous task. One who can inscribe the twenty-four faces may commit them to memory, for the meaning of talismans and incantations aligns. Let one attempt this, and they will know these words are not false.

Blue silk substitutes for severed hair: for each tablet, twenty-four feet are used to bind the dragon. Each of the Three Mansions has its prescribed number of loops. Twenty-one golden knots are prepared, seven for each tablet, tied upon the silk as the dragon’s bridle, symbolizing steadfastness.

chunks.original_text: 清微斋法 经名：清微斋法。 撰人不详。 二卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部方法类。 清微斋法卷上 道宗统系 元始天王。 元始者，实为至道之高称，万道之根本也。 虚元郁秀，开图帝先，玄都玉山上京清微天宫。 龙汉劫中，御大罗玄元宝台清华妙元之殿，授玉宸道君以清微妙玄之道，太上老君以玄都应运玉策。 玉宸道君。 乃灵宝帝尊上古立运之前，太元生化之宗也。 融结万品，朗耀英鲜，都大罗玉京山禹余天宫。 妙炁至玄，授真元妙化天帝以清微通真玉式，紫宸太华天帝以飞玄枢机宝章。 真元妙化天帝，讳奕慧。 乃妙化天主，都洞妙宝化宫，又元始万神宫。 玉虚明皇道君，讳邦旭。 乃总仙上真玄中大法师也。 主天枢省事。 太玄玄一真人，讳郁罗翘，又朗允契。 乃玉清妙道天君，以琼台召灵之章居龙梵宫，主玄都应明府，又妙道金元宫。 太玄玄二真人，讳光妙音，又觉真轩。 乃上清妙化天君，以妙道神仙内法居普照宫，主玄都宗昔府，又妙化崇章宫。 太玄玄三真人，讳真定光，又哲西元。 乃太清妙感天君，以明道应化枢旨居广清宫，主玄都正昌府，又妙感崇延宫。 清微通光大妙天帝，讳琼宏。 居玉清通元宫。 泓灵元化洞妙天帝，讳扶高匀。 居上清元化宫，又元化洞玄宫。 神曜冲一丹刚天帝，讳炳育。 居玉京神丹宫，又冲一宫。 清微平天总道皇帝朱昌行。 居定宏中宫。 清微洞阳曜光皇帝，讳完都。 天官化身，居元阳官。 通明昭烈天玄上帝康完臣。 居天曹上明宫。 太微演化崇明妙感帝君端悲良。 居太微演完宫。 浮光曜真洞明天帝龙冲一。 居洞寅宫。 天曹储福广化威明元君许昭立。 主天曹景命府，又天曹化命府。 天曹储福洪灵斡化上圣元君赵顺。 主天曹储福府。 丹赤和光冲天太阜元君章孔实，一名九天元恭圣母。 居九天元灵宫。 九天冲和明道飞雷掣电通化元君卜超祖，一名九天上灵真妃。 居九天定福中宫。 南陵浮光天官讳朗期。 唐时降於西京，主南极浮光宫。 炎明洞灵回曜天君讳复奕。 主洞阳炎明宫。 太阳旸谷神王讳玑中。 居长桑林下旸谷之坛。 万变九真玉仙圣母太素元君石杰昭。 居玉西台玄光山上明宫，主巫山福源宫。 冲玄应运金元洞耀元君晖。 主保真宫。 通英演云端化妙感元君暄。 主灵真宫。 神妙广惠道光崇化元君昫。 主太真宫。 凝云膺阜清辉昌一元君泓。 主总真宫。 玄昌灵官冲化龙光希和元君洪。 主云真宫。 真一太和晃云回景元君没。 主威真宫。 形变清玄洪明宗谅元君淑。 主含真宫。 朱陵丹刚魏霄妙和元君嫖。 主元真宫。 紫灵光惠混神自明元君爟。 主道真宫。 虚化昭隆寂空梵照元君辉。 主育真宫。 茂育崇清虚广照冲平一元君燧。 主高真宫。 玄都明和洞清太光元君郭勤，一名九天玄女，主玄初太光宫。 清微泓照洞清元君傅惠祈。 主玉京泓照宫。 清微太华明运元君韩俊。 居太华道元宫。 九光神运自然玄照元君杨熙。 幽州人，主神运元照宫。 紫清金光储庆好道元君沈宗清。 齐人，主紫元福华宫。 紫霞丹光雷首电光元君苏刚。 主紫霞雷明宫。 太一茂隆自然通化元君管方仲。 东京人，主太一通明宫。 宗昌福原元君姚郁。 主玄明宗福宫。 护明元妃玉隆丹刚清华紫光道君王说，字决。 南京人，乃玄光圣母，主四溟事，唐降居东海景清宫，主西华元妙宫。

**The Qingwei Zhai Method**
*Sutra Title:* *Qingwei Zhai Method*. Author unknown. Two fascicles.
*Source Text:* *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, Methods Category.

**Fascicle One of the Qingwei Zhai Method**

**Lineage of the Daoist Tradition**
The Primordial Heavenly King of the Origin.
"Origin" is the supreme appellation of the Ultimate Dao, the root of all ways. Vast and flourishing in emptiness, he first unfolded the celestial charts and presided over the Imperial Dawn. In the Jade Capital of the Mystic Capital Mountain, within the Celestial Palace of the Pure Tenuity Heaven, during the Dragon Han Kalpa, he ascended the Precious Terrace of the Great Mystery, the Hall of Luminous Mystery and Primordial Radiance, where he transmitted the Dao of Pure Tenuity and Wondrous Mystery to the Jade Sovereign Dao Lord, and the Jade Tablet of Cyclical Response from the Supreme Lord Lao to the Mystic Capital.

**The Jade Sovereign Dao Lord**
He is the ancestral founder of the Lingbao Imperial Honored One before the establishment of the ancient kalpas, the origin of the Great Primordial’s generation and transformation. Fusing and coalescing the myriad forms, his brilliance shines resplendent. He resides in the Jade Capital Mountain of the Great Mystery Heaven, within the Celestial Palace of the Yu Yu Heaven. With his wondrous qi of ultimate mystery, he transmitted the Jade Formula of Pure Tenuity and Penetrating Reality to the Heavenly Emperor of True Primordial and Wondrous Transformation, and the Precious Chapters of the Flying Mystery Mechanism to the Heavenly Emperor of the Purple Tenuity and Great Florescence.

**The Heavenly Emperor of True Primordial and Wondrous Transformation**, personal name Yi Hui.
He is the sovereign of the Heaven of Wondrous Transformation, residing in the Palace of Wondrous Treasure Transformation, also known as the Palace of the Myriad Spirits of the Origin.

**The Jade Clarity Illustrious August Dao Lord**, personal name Bang Xu.
He is the Grand Dharma Master of the Mystic Center among the Supreme Immortals and Perfected Ones, presiding over the affairs of the Celestial Pivot Ministry.

**The Perfected One of the Great Mystery and Primordial Unity**, personal name Yu Luo Qiao, also known as Lang Yun Qi.
He is the Heavenly Lord of the Wondrous Dao of Jade Clarity, dwelling in the Dragon Brahma Palace with the Chapters of the Jade Terrace Summoning Spirits. He presides over the Hall of Cyclical Response in the Mystic Capital, also known as the Palace of the Golden Mystery and Primordial Radiance.

**The Perfected One of the Great Mystery and Second Unity**, personal name Guang Miao Yin, also known as Jue Zhen Xuan.
He is the Heavenly Lord of the Wondrous Transformation of Supreme Clarity, residing in the Palace of Universal Illumination with the Inner Methods of the Divine Immortals of the Wondrous Dao. He presides over the Hall of Ancestral Former Ages in the Mystic Capital, also known as the Palace of the Venerable Chapters of Wondrous Transformation.

**The Perfected One of the Great Mystery and Third Unity**, personal name Zhen Ding Guang, also known as Zhe Xi Yuan.
He is the Heavenly Lord of the Wondrous Response of Supreme Clarity, dwelling in the Palace of Vast Clarity with the Pivotal Essentials of the Illuminating Dao and Cyclical Transformation. He presides over the Hall of Proper Prosperity in the Mystic Capital, also known as the Palace of the Venerable Extension of Wondrous Response.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Great Mystery of Pure Tenuity and Penetrating Radiance**, personal name Qiong Hong.
He resides in the Palace of Penetrating Primordial Radiance of Jade Clarity.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Vast Spirit and Primordial Transformation of the Mystic Cavern**, personal name Fu Gao Yun.
He resides in the Palace of Primordial Transformation of Supreme Clarity, also known as the Palace of the Mystic Cavern and Primordial Transformation.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Divine Brilliance and Primordial Unity of Cinnabar Firmness**, personal name Bing Yu.
He resides in the Palace of the Divine Cinnabar of the Jade Capital, also known as the Palace of Primordial Unity.

**The August Emperor of the Total Dao of the Level Heaven of Pure Tenuity**, Zhu Chang Xing.
He resides in the Central Palace of Stabilizing Vastness.

**The Radiant August Emperor of the Yang Brilliance of the Mystic Cavern of Pure Tenuity**, personal name Wan Du.
A transformation body of the Celestial Officials, he resides in the Palace of Primordial Yang.

**The Heavenly Mysterious Supreme Thearch of Illuminating Clarity and Manifest Efficacy**, Kang Wan Chen.
He resides in the Palace of Supreme Clarity in the Celestial Ministry.

**The August Lord of the Venerable Mystery and Wondrous Response of the Great Tenuity’s Evolutionary Transformation**, Duan Bei Liang.
He resides in the Palace of the Evolutionary Perfection of the Great Tenuity.

**The Heavenly Emperor of the Floating Brilliance and Illuminating Reality of the Mystic Cavern**, Long Chong Yi.
He resides in the Palace of the Mystic Tiger.

**The Perfected Lord of Vast Transformation and Majestic Radiance, Storing Blessings in the Celestial Ministry**, Xu Zhao Li.
He presides over the Hall of Scenic Destiny in the Celestial Ministry, also known as the Hall of Transformative Destiny in the Celestial Ministry.

**The Supreme Sage Perfected Lord of Vast Spirit and Revolving Transformation, Storing Blessings in the Celestial Ministry**, Zhao Shun.
He presides over the Hall of Stored Blessings in the Celestial Ministry.

**The Perfected Lord of the Great Mound of Cinnabar Radiance and Primordial Harmony Ascending Heaven**, Zhang Kong Shi, also known as the Holy Mother of the Primordial Reverence of the Nine Heavens.
She resides in the Palace of the Primordial Spirit of the Nine Heavens.

**The Perfected Lord of the Nine Heavens’ Primordial Harmony, Illuminating Dao, Flying Thunder, and Lightning Transformation**, Bu Chao Zu, also known as the True Consort of the Supreme Spirit of the Nine Heavens.
She resides in the Central Palace of Stabilizing Blessings in the Nine Heavens.

**The Celestial Official of the Floating Brilliance of the Southern Mound**, personal name Lang Qi.
During the Tang dynasty, he descended in the Western Capital, presiding over the Palace of Floating Brilliance in the Southern Culmen.

**The Heavenly Lord of the Returning Brilliance of the Mystic Cavern and Blazing Clarity**, personal name Fu Yi.
He presides over the Palace of Blazing Clarity in the Yang Cavern.

**The Divine King of the Solar Valley of Radiant Yang**, personal name Ji Zhong.
He resides at the Altar of the Solar Valley beneath the Mulberry Grove.

**The Sagely Mother of the Jade Immortals and Nine Perfected Ones of Myriad Transformations**, the Primordial Lady of Supreme Simplicity, Shi Jie Zhao.
She resides in the Palace of Illuminating Clarity atop the Mountain of Mystic Radiance in the Jade Western Terrace, presiding over the Palace of Blessings and Origins on Mount Wu.

**The Perfected Lord of the Golden Mystery and Cyclical Response of Primordial Radiance in the Mystic Cavern**, Hui.
He presides over the Palace of Preserving Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Wondrous Response of Cloud-Transforming Brilliance and Evolutionary Radiance**, Xuan.
He presides over the Palace of the Numinous Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Venerable Transformation of the Dao’s Radiance and Vast Kindness**, Xu.
He presides over the Palace of the Supreme Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Primordial Unity of Congealing Clouds and Prosperous Clarity**, Hong.
He presides over the Palace of the Total Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Mystic Prosperity and Numinous Transformation of the Dragon Brilliance and Harmonious Radiance**, Hong.
He presides over the Palace of the Cloud Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Returning Brilliance of the Radiant Clouds and Grand Harmony of the True Unity**, Mo.
He presides over the Palace of the Majestic Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Transformative Forms and Illuminating Clarity of the Vast Mystery**, Shu.
He presides over the Palace of the Embracing Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Cinnabar Firmness and Mystic Harmony of the Vermilion Mound**, Piao.
She presides over the Palace of the Primordial Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Self-Illuminating Spirit and Blending Radiance of the Purple Numinosity**, Guan.
She presides over the Palace of the Dao Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Illuminating Brilliance of the Empty Silence and Brahma Radiance**, Hui.
She presides over the Palace of Nurturing Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Vast Illumination of Flourishing Growth and Venerable Clarity**, Sui.
He presides over the Palace of the Lofty Reality.

**The Perfected Lord of the Illuminating Harmony and Mystic Clarity of the Mystic Capital**, Guo Qin, also known as the Mysterious Woman of the Nine Heavens.
She presides over the Palace of the Primordial Radiance of the Mystic Dawn.

**The Perfected Lord of the Vast Illumination and Mystic Clarity of Pure Tenuity**, Fu Hui Qi.
She presides over the Palace of the Vast Illumination of the Jade Capital.

**The Perfected Lord of the Illuminating Cyclical Response of the Great Florescence of Pure Tenuity**, Han Jun.
She resides in the Palace of the Dao and Primordial Radiance of the Great Florescence.

**The Perfected Lord of the Nine Radiant Spirits and Natural Mystic Illumination**, Yang Xi.
A native of Youzhou, he presides over the Palace of the Numinous Cyclical Radiance.

**The Perfected Lord of the Purple Clarity, Golden Radiance, and Stored Blessings, Fond of the Dao**, Shen Zong Qing.
A native of Qi, she presides over the Palace of the Purple Primordial and Blessed Florescence.

**The Perfected Lord of the Purple Radiance, Cinnabar Brilliance, Thunder’s Roar, and Lightning’s Flash**, Su Gang.
She presides over the Palace of the Purple Radiance and Thunder’s Clarity.

**The Perfected Lord of the Flourishing Prosperity and Natural Cyclical Transformation of the Great Unity**, Guan Fang Zhong.
A native of the Eastern Capital, he presides over the Palace of the Illuminating Communication of the Great Unity.

**The Perfected Lord of the Ancestral Prosperity and Blessed Origins**, Yao Yu.
She presides over the Palace of the Mystic Clarity and Ancestral Blessings.

**The Jade Numinosity and Cinnabar Firmness of the Protecting Clarity Consort, the Radiant Purple Brilliance of the Dao Lord**, Wang Shuo, styled Jue.
A native of Nanjing, she is the Sagely Mother of Mystic Radiance, presiding over the affairs of the Four Seas. During the Tang dynasty, she descended to reside in the Palace of Scenic Clarity in the Eastern Sea, presiding over the Palace of the Primordial Mystery of the Western Florescence.

chunks.original_text: 太清泰玄元君文镛。 主景辉太和宫，授祖元君。 灵宝流系 玉宸道君。 紫宸太华天帝讳宗昶。 乃泰华天王，主都太微华明宫。 东华司命青童道君讳阿娄罗。 乃东华木公，居方诸宫，主神仙道籍。 三天显道律令天帝方式遂。 乃青灵始老，主玉天令元宫。 大有妙玄冲道自然天帝东垕。 乃东斗前一星，主大有冲照宫。 紫微九照飞玄内化天帝高膺则。 蔡州人，居南海中，主九照刚宏府。 泰灵洞光明运普照天帝龚宗卿。 主运精府。 西城洞明真人王褒。 乃金阙上宰，主金阙城昌宫左府，又西城总英府。 总真真人王远字方平。 乃小有洞天，主居明育传爟宫，又清和元阳府。 高元宸照紫虚元君魏华存，字贤安。 晋人，魏舒女，主金阙紫章丹会府，居高元宸照宫，又大丹宫。 形变枢机紫光安明元君欧阳长胜。 凤翔府人，主安明宫。 紫泓周运升和清玄元君汤宗朝。 梓州人，主神州陵光府。 储庆保福洞光宗朝元君龙炎。 道州人，主天山元照府。 九天神宏通明广冲真君林昌卿。 大明府人，主广冲府。 天华冲灵紫灵华阳玄应真君陈焕然。 彭州人，主天华冲灵府。 上清玄曜浮丘元勋真君熙。 主紫明府。 冲和太元洞灵天元真君张壬通。 寿州人，主和灵府。 紫皇冲灵太明内元元君朱钦贤。 琼州人，主紫皇保生府。 龙光普照洞华元君汪淑道。 汉州人，居洞华宫。 九天洞明元君许龄卿。 秦降剑州，主九天洞清育玄宫。 九天隆玄太明通和元君余果。 鄂州人，主九天太明府。 九天妙道真运元君杨彻。 秦降河中府枢，辖雷霆为帅，主九天长原宫。 冲妙丹化玄和自然元君柳崇中。 朱崖军人，主九龙丹和宫。 紫微霞光妙感洞辉元君宋希仙。 广州人，主霞光明良府，居南离农山。 玉堂真人朱轩。 东京人，主太清宫凤凰阁玄灵宫，居金华山。 郁华景林真人杨茂中。 西京人，主景林元昌府，居东海山。 青惠昭化扶桑真君卜冀。 随州人，主昭灵府，角亢星中居。 东华上佐司命真人杨羲和。 主洞阳端灵右府，又东华司命府。 东华上相上清仙翁许翙。 主紫阳极玄宫。 紫灵妙道炎明洞光元君谢晋刚。 主紫灵天化府。 洞真万福元君纪师正。 主太虚洞清宫。 上清元君西华圣母谌婴。 早登仙籍，阐孝道明王之教，主丹阳谅光宫，应化姓氏不一。 高明大使天机内相许逊。 受谌元君招真上明玉章，得道於八月十五日，拔宅上升。 主天机省，居玉都清庆宫，洪州人，见本传。 祖元君。 道德流派 太上老君。 乃道德至尊万法之祖，玄炁所生，功宰难名。 都大罗金华山大赤天宫，化身度关，授文始先生关令真人以清微运玄经。 周代人。 关令真人姓尹讳喜。 着书行于世，预知紫炁开祥，际遇犊车，亲传玄妙，主大枢中宫，后授。 泰明清惠真人师复。 乃东华帝君应化，汉州，降生，主龙丘山通明洞，在东海广桑山，又皇清府。 西华通惠元君庞俏道。 汉州绵竹县庚除治人，主西华广圣宫。 元灵广玄道妙态和元君商茱。 彭州人，主云阳府。 碧灵广圣洪灵元君锺元贵。 青州人，主天昌府。 太霞天崇道化元君岳漈。 南京人，主崇光府。 通和清灵明昭玄真人徐自中。 衡州人，主明一府。 太玄真人赵守真，又陈拱。 苏州人，主太玄清明宫太元府。 天山真人洪滨，又晓留。 雍州人，主天一上阳宫天惠府。

**The Grand Clarity and Supreme Mystery Perfected Lord**, Wen Yong.
He presides over the Palace of Scenic Brilliance and Grand Harmony, conferring upon the Ancestral Perfected Lord.

**The Numinous Treasure Flowing Lineage, the Jade Celestial Dao Lord**.

**The Purple Celestial and Grand Florescence Heavenly Emperor**, named Zong Chang.
He is the Heavenly King of Mount Taihua, presiding over the Capital of the Grand Tenuity and the Palace of Florescence Brilliance.

**The Eastern Florescence Controller of Destiny, the Azure Lad Dao Lord**, named Aluoluo.
He is the Eastern Florescence Wood Duke, residing in the Fangzhu Palace and overseeing the registers of the divine immortals’ Dao.

**The Three Heavens Manifesting Dao and Ordinances Heavenly Emperor**, Fang Shisu.
He is the Azure Numinosity and Primordial Elder, presiding over the Jade Heavenly Ordinance and Primordial Palace.

**The Grand Possession, Wondrous Mystery, and Unfathomable Dao of the Natural Heavenly Emperor**, Dong Hou.
He is the first star preceding the Eastern Dipper, presiding over the Palace of Grand Possession and Unfathomable Illumination.

**The Purple Tenuity, Ninefold Illumination, and Soaring Mystery of the Inner Transformation Heavenly Emperor**, Gao Yingze.
A native of Caizhou, he resides in the Southern Sea and presides over the Ninefold Illumination and Firm Vastness Mansion.

**The Supreme Numinosity, Cavernous Brilliance, and Universally Illuminating Heavenly Emperor**, Gong Zongqing.
He presides over the Mansion of Circulating Essence.

**The Cavernous Clarity Perfected of the Western Citadel**, Wang Bao.
He is the Supreme Minister of the Golden Portal, presiding over the Left Mansion of the Golden Portal and Prosperous Florescence Palace, as well as the Western Citadel’s Assembly of All Heroes.

**The Perfected of the Assembly of All Truths**, Wang Yuan, styled Fangping.
He is the Lesser Cavern Heaven, residing in the Palace of Illuminating Cultivation and Transmitting Brilliance, as well as the Pure Harmony and Primordial Yang Mansion.

**The Highest Clarity, Purple Void, and Numinous Illumination Perfected Lady of the Purple Radiance**, Wei Huacun, styled Xian’an.
A native of the Jin dynasty and daughter of Wei Shu, she presides over the Golden Portal’s Purple Chapters and Cinnabar Assembly Mansion, residing in the Palace of Highest Clarity and Numinous Illumination, as well as the Grand Cinnabar Palace.

**The Transformative Mechanism of Form and the Purple Brilliance of Peaceful Clarity Perfected Lady**, Ouyang Changsheng.
A native of Fengxiang Prefecture, she presides over the Palace of Peaceful Clarity.

**The Purple Vastness, Circulating Zhou, Ascending Harmony, and Pure Mystery Perfected Lady**, Tang Zongchao.
A native of Zizhou, she presides over the Mansion of Divine Continent’s Tumulus Brilliance.

**The Treasured Blessings, Preserving Fortune, Cavernous Brilliance, and Ancestral Illumination Perfected Lady**, Long Yan.
A native of Daozhou, she presides over the Heavenly Mountain’s Primordial Illumination Mansion.

**The Nine Heavens, Divine Vastness, Illuminating Clarity, and Expansive Unfathomable Perfected Lord**, Lin Changqing.
A native of Daming Prefecture, he presides over the Expansive Unfathomable Mansion.

**The Heavenly Florescence, Unfathomable Numinosity, Purple Numinosity, and Florescence Yang of the Mysterious Response Perfected Lord**, Chen Huanran.
A native of Pengzhou, he presides over the Heavenly Florescence and Unfathomable Numinosity Mansion.

**The Supreme Clarity, Mysterious Brilliance, and Floating Hill Perfected Lord of Merit**, Xi.
He presides over the Purple Clarity Mansion.

**The Unfathomable Harmony, Supreme Mystery, and Cavernous Numinosity of the Heavenly Primordial Perfected Lord**, Zhang Rentong.
A native of Shouzhou, he presides over the Harmony and Numinosity Mansion.

**The Purple Sovereign, Unfathomable Numinosity, Supreme Clarity, and Inner Mystery Perfected Lady**, Zhu Qinxian.
A native of Qiongzhou, she presides over the Purple Sovereign’s Preserving Life Mansion.

**The Dragon Brilliance, Universally Illuminating, and Cavernous Florescence Perfected Lady**, Wang Shudao.
A native of Hanzhou, she resides in the Cavernous Florescence Palace.

**The Nine Heavens and Cavernous Clarity Perfected Lady**, Xu Lingqing.
She descended in Qin to Jianzhou, presiding over the Nine Heavens’ Cavernous Clarity and Mysterious Cultivation Palace.

**The Nine Heavens, Majestic Mystery, Supreme Clarity, and Harmonious Communication Perfected Lady**, Yu Guo.
A native of Ezhou, she presides over the Nine Heavens’ Supreme Clarity Mansion.

**The Nine Heavens’ Wondrous Dao and True Circulation Perfected Lady**, Yang Che.
She descended in Qin to the Pivot of Hezhong Prefecture, commanding thunder and lightning as her generals, and presides over the Nine Heavens’ Eternal Plain Palace.

**The Unfathomable Mystery, Cinnabar Transformation, Mysterious Harmony, and Natural Perfected Lady**, Liu Chongzhong.
A native of Zhuyajun, she presides over the Nine Dragons’ Cinnabar Harmony Palace.

**The Purple Tenuity, Rosy Brilliance, Wondrous Perception, and Cavernous Radiance Perfected Lady**, Song Xixian.
A native of Guangzhou, she presides over the Rosy Brilliance and Illuminating Excellence Mansion, residing on Southern Li Nong Mountain.

**The Jade Hall Perfected**, Zhu Xuan.
A native of the Eastern Capital, he presides over the Grand Clarity Palace’s Phoenix Pavilion and the Mysterious Numinosity Palace, residing on Golden Florescence Mountain.

**The Fragrant Florescence and Scenic Grove Perfected**, Yang Maozhong.
A native of the Western Capital, he presides over the Scenic Grove and Primordial Prosperity Mansion, residing on Eastern Sea Mountain.

**The Azure Wisdom, Illuminating Transformation, and Fusang Perfected Lord**, Bu Ji.
A native of Suizhou, he presides over the Illuminating Numinosity Mansion, residing among the Horn and Neck stars.

**The Eastern Florescence, Supreme Assistant, Controller of Destiny Perfected**, Yang Xihe.
He presides over the Cavernous Yang’s Upright Numinosity Right Mansion, as well as the Eastern Florescence Controller of Destiny Mansion.

**The Eastern Florescence, Supreme Minister, Supreme Clarity Immortal Elder**, Xu Hui.
He presides over the Purple Yang’s Ultimate Mystery Palace.

**The Purple Numinosity, Wondrous Dao, Blazing Clarity, and Cavernous Brilliance Perfected Lady**, Xie Jingang.
She presides over the Purple Numinosity and Heavenly Transformation Mansion.

**The Cavernous Truth and Myriad Blessings Perfected Lady**, Ji Shizheng.
She presides over the Grand Void and Cavernous Clarity Palace.

**The Supreme Clarity Perfected Lady and Western Florescence Sagely Mother**, Chen Ying.
Early enrolled in the immortal registers, she expounded the teachings of the Filial Dao and Luminous King, presiding over the Cinnabar Yang and Forgiving Brilliance Palace, manifesting under various surnames.

**The Highest Clarity Grand Envoy and Heavenly Mechanism Inner Minister**, Xu Xun.
Having received the Jade Chapters of the Supreme Clarity from the Sagely Mother Chen, he attained the Dao on the fifteenth day of the eighth month and ascended with his household. He presides over the Heavenly Mechanism Bureau, residing in the Jade Capital’s Pure Celebration Palace. A native of Hongzhou, his full biography is recorded elsewhere.

**The Ancestral Perfected Lord**.

**The Lineage of the Dao and Virtue**:
**The Supreme Lord Lao**.
He is the Dao and Virtue’s Ultimate Veneration, the progenitor of the myriad methods, born of primordial qi, whose merits are beyond naming. He resides in the Grand Luo’s Golden Florescence Mountain and Great Crimson Heavenly Palace. Manifesting to cross barriers, he conferred the *Scripture of the Unfathomable Circulation of the Pure Subtlety* upon the Worthy Master of Literary Beginnings, the Pass Keeper Perfected.

**The Pass Keeper Perfected**, surnamed Yin, named Xi.
His writings circulated in the world. Foreseeing the auspicious unfolding of purple qi, he encountered an ox-cart and personally transmitted the mysterious wonders. He presides over the Great Pivot’s Central Palace.

**The Grand Clarity, Pure Wisdom Perfected**, Shi Fu.
He is the Eastern Florescence Emperor’s manifestation, born in Hanzhou, presiding over the Dragon Mound Mountain’s Cavern of Illuminating Communication, located on the Eastern Sea’s Broad Mulberry Mountain, as well as the August Clarity Mansion.

**The Western Florescence, Illuminating Communication Perfected Lady**, Pang Qiaodao.
A native of Gengchu Township, Mianzhu County, Hanzhou, she presides over the Western Florescence’s Broad Sagacity Palace.

**The Primordial Numinosity, Vast Mystery, Dao of Wondrous Attitude, and Harmonious Communication Perfected Lady**, Shang Zhu.
A native of Pengzhou, she presides over the Cloud Yang Mansion.

**The Azure Numinosity, Vast Sagacity, Vast Numinosity, and Majestic Numinosity Perfected Lady**, Zhong Yuangui.
A native of Qingzhou, she presides over the Heavenly Prosperity Mansion.

**The Grand Rosy Brilliance, Heavenly Veneration, Dao Transformation Perfected Lady**, Yue Ji.
A native of Nanjing, she presides over the Venerating Brilliance Mansion.

**The Illuminating Harmony, Pure Numinosity, and Manifesting Clarity of the Mysterious Perfected**, Xu Zizhong.
A native of Hengzhou, he presides over the Illuminating Unity Mansion.

**The Grand Mystery Perfected**, Zhao Shouzhen, also Chen Gong.
A native of Suzhou, he presides over the Grand Mystery’s Pure Clarity Palace and Supreme Primordial Mansion.

**The Heavenly Mountain Perfected**, Hong Bin, also Xiao Liu.
A native of Yongzhou, he presides over the Heavenly Unity’s Supreme Yang Palace and Heavenly Grace Mansion.

**The Jade Numinosity and Cinnabar Firmness of the Protecting Clarity Consort, the Radiant Purple Brilliance of the Dao Lord**, Wang Shuo, styled Jue.
A native of Nanjing, she is the Sagely Mother of Mystic Radiance, presiding over the affairs of the Four Seas. During the Tang dynasty, she descended to reside in the Palace of Scenic Clarity in the Eastern Sea, presiding over the Palace of the Primordial Mystery of the Western Florescence.

chunks.original_text: 玄上真人鲁惠元。 邓州人，主洞玄保真宫。 太极左宫仙翁冲应孚佑真君葛玄，字孝先。 越人，修炼得道，登太极内相，主太极灵曹宫。 太极庆融北灵内辅真人郑思远。 主庆融元冲府，居蕾买阳宫。 祖元君。 正一流派 太上老君授 三天圣师泰玄上相真君姓张，讳道陵。 吴人，正月十五日生天目山，仕汉为尚书，弃官得道。 主泰玄都省，居元素元辉府，以子嗣教。 太清真人嗣师君张衡，仕汉为侍中圣师之子也。 太清真人系师君张鲁。 仕汉为阆中侯，侍中长子也。 泰玄圣母女师君张文姬。 圣师女，俱得道妙，举家上升。 太和依玄元君宋益诚。 东汉西京人，三天演教，主茂化府事。 清微洞玄宝衡紫华元和明道太一神景元君王正宏。 居玄都太冲楼右紫辉宫阙下。 清微茂晨保运金明元君彭涵原。 居井鬼星之丹昭府，镇丹昭风火雷霆自为雷帅。 神耀保天道化元君广溶。 酆州人，主神耀府，掌海上神仙。 慧台左辅真白自然通妙元君翁坚。 东京人，主中淑灵真府。 紫微总真元君梁阜。 惠州人，主真和府。 太华司命流金飞光丹霞真人朱安道。 乃洞妙神烈真君，主崇霞宫。 太和明一真人丘谅叟。 梓州人，主明阳昭元府。 上清妙道昌福宗源真人林自容。 岳州人，主源昌府。 灵妙和凝元君需东。 东汉彭州人，主琼和府，后为雷帅，灵异不一。 玉眸灵光圣母太元君朱恒。 桂阳军人，主紫光灵应宫，又灵光通化府。 祖元君。 四派总归 金阙昭凝洞清明道保仙通化元君清微元上侍宸祖舒，又遂道，字防仲。 零陵郡人。 元君励志修真，遍礼许真君、郑真人、灵光圣母师君。 又尝於西京清虚之洞，神化之溪，遇太清泰玄元君，降於溪滨。 元君异之，就礼焉。 元君与俱至洞中，授以元始大道。 俾乘枯木，顺流听其所止，少焉木复故所，已失天人所在矣。 元君县是会四振而一之。 后居金阙昭明宫，主洞照府，又金阙明道宫离农山上京，又主金阙中灵凝照府。 琼室内应洞清上景元君郭玉隆。 京师人，乃清微太霞侍宸，主紫清府，又洞清府。 紫光耀真福和元君傅央煜字子方。 乃三天上辅，居离农山昌耀府。 又云居海岳太华山，主龙光府。 龙光道明元君姚庄，字淑奇。 西京人，或号广昌元君。 乃三天侍经，居广桑冲和宫，主隆惠府，往还二三所。 宸清妙化紫英玉惠元君高爽。 燕京胃山谷口居，乃三天侍御，主广桑山洞辉景酆府，又玉英昭凝府，有寓止三所。 元勋皇灵夫人全茂。 乃和阳侍真，主和阳宫，西华清虚真人华英。 凤翔府人，正月初三日生，乃洞阳上宰清微明元仙卿，居西华山。 青城通惠真人朱洞元。 成都人，二月初一日生，乃神霄玉枢使清微洞卫上卿，隐青城山。 云山保一真人李少微。 房州人，三月初五日生，乃五雷院使清微都元右卿，隐青城山。 眉山混隐真人南毕道，字斗文。 乃清微保元仙卿，眉州人，丙辰十一月初三日寅时降生眉山。 性淡荣利，学通天人，仕宋累官至广西宪，尝遇保一真人，授以至道，能役使神祇。 一日，有朱衣吏降于庭，谓真人曰：上帝闻公名，今拜为斗中六通掌水使者，宜阐杨玄教，弘济生灵，伺公功圆，召还金阙。 言讫，朱衣吏冉冉腾空而去。 隐青城山。 碧水雷渊真人黄舜申，字晦伯。 建宁人，甲申闰八月初五日未时生，幼聪悟过人，三教九流之书无所不览，随父宦广西时，宪使混隐真人见而奇之，尽以其书付焉。
chunks.translated_text:
**The Supreme Mystery Perfected**, Lu Huiyuan.
A native of Dengzhou, he presides over the Cavernous Mystery’s Protecting Perfection Palace.

**The Supreme Ultimate’s Left Palace Immortal Elder, Impulse-Responding Blessing-Fostering Perfected Lord**, Ge Xuan, styled Xiaoxian.
A native of Yue, he cultivated and attained the Dao, ascending as the Supreme Ultimate’s Inner Minister, presiding over the Supreme Ultimate’s Numinous Court Palace.

**The Supreme Ultimate’s Celebrating Harmony, Northern Numinosity’s Inner Assistant Perfected**, Zheng Siyuan.
Presiding over the Celebrating Harmony’s Primordial Impulse Mansion, residing in the Thunderous Radiance’s Yang Palace.

**The Ancestral Perfected Lady**.

**The Orthodox Unity Lineage**
The Most High Lord Lao bestowed upon **The Three Heavens’ Sagely Master, Supreme Mystery’s Prime Minister Perfected Lord**, surnamed Zhang, named Daoling.
A native of Wu, born on the fifteenth day of the first lunar month on Mount Tianmu, he served the Han as a Minister of State before relinquishing office to attain the Dao. Presiding over the Supreme Mystery’s Capital Province, residing in the Primordial Essence’s Primordial Brilliance Mansion, he transmitted the teachings to his descendants.

**The Grand Clarity’s Perfected, Successor Master Lord**, Zhang Heng, served the Han as a Palace Attendant and was the Sagely Master’s son.

**The Grand Clarity’s Perfected, Lineage Master Lord**, Zhang Lu, served the Han as Marquis of Langzhong and was the Palace Attendant’s eldest son.

**The Supreme Mystery’s Sagely Mother, Female Master Lord**, Zhang Wenji.
The Sagely Master’s daughter, she and her family together attained the wondrous Dao and ascended as a whole.

**The Grand Harmony’s Reliant Mystery Perfected Lady**, Song Yicheng.
A native of the Western Capital of the Eastern Han, she expounded the Three Heavens’ teachings and presided over the Flourishing Transformation Mansion.

**The Luminous Dao of the Azure Mystery’s Cavernous Mystery, Treasure Balance’s Purple Brilliance, Primordial Harmony’s Radiant Dao, Supreme Unity’s Divine Effulgence Perfected Lady**, Wang Zhenghong.
Residing beneath the Purple Radiance Palace Gate to the right of the Supreme Impulse Tower in the Mysterious Capital.

**The Azure Mystery’s Flourishing Dawn, Protecting Fortune’s Golden Brilliance Perfected Lady**, Peng Hanyuan.
Residing in the Cinnabar Brilliance Mansion of the Well and Ghost Stars, she commands the Cinnabar Brilliance’s wind, fire, and thunder as their Thunder Marshal.

**The Divine Effulgence’s Protecting Heaven, Dao-Transforming Perfected Lady**, Guang Rong.
A native of Fengzhou, she presides over the Divine Effulgence Mansion and governs the immortals of the seas.

**The Wisdom Terrace’s Left Assistant, Perfected of White’s Natural Penetrating Wondrous Mystery Perfected Lady**, Weng Jian.
A native of the Eastern Capital, she presides over the Central Pure Numinous Perfection Mansion.

**The Purple Tenuity’s Governor of All Perfected Perfected Lady**, Liang Fu.
A native of Huizhou, she presides over the Perfected Harmony Mansion.

**The Grand Flower’s Controller of Destiny, Flowing Metal’s Flying Radiance, Cinnabar Rosy Clouds Perfected**, Zhu Andao.
The Cavernous Mystery’s Divine and Fierce Perfected Lord, presiding over the Venerating Rosy Clouds Palace.

**The Grand Harmony’s Illuminating Unity Perfected**, Qiu Liangsuo.
A native of Zizhou, he presides over the Illuminating Yang’s Radiant Primordial Mansion.

**The Supreme Clarity’s Wondrous Dao, Flourishing Fortune’s Lineage-Source Perfected**, Lin Zirong.
A native of Yuezhou, he presides over the Source Flourishing Mansion.

**The Numinous Mystery’s Harmonizing Congealment Perfected Lady**, Xu Dong.
A native of Pengzhou of the Eastern Han, she presides over the Jade Harmony Mansion and later became a Thunder Marshal, manifesting countless numinous marvels.

**The Jade Pupil’s Numinous Radiance, Sagely Mother, Supreme Primordial Perfected Lady**, Zhu Heng.
A native of Guiyang Prefecture, she presides over the Purple Radiance’s Numinous Response Palace and the Numinous Radiance’s Penetrating Transformation Mansion.

**The Ancestral Perfected Lady**.

**The Four Lineages’ Convergence**
**The Golden Watchtower’s Illuminating Congealment, Cavernous Clarity’s Bright Dao, Protecting Immortals’ Penetrating Transformation Perfected Lady of the Azure Mystery’s Primordial Supreme Attendant**, Shu Zu, also Suidao, styled Fangzhong.
A native of Lingling Prefecture, the Perfected Lady devoted herself to cultivation, paying homage to Perfected Lord Xu, Perfected Zheng, and the Sagely Mother of Numinous Radiance. Once, by the Divine Transformation Stream in the Cavernous Emptiness Grotto of the Western Capital, she encountered the Grand Clarity’s Supreme Mystery Primordial Perfected Lady descending upon the stream’s bank. Marveling at this, the Perfected Lady approached to pay her respects. Together they entered the grotto, where she was bestowed the Primordial Beginning’s Great Dao. Instructed to ride a withered tree and drift with the current, she soon found the tree restored to its original place, the celestial being vanished without a trace. The Perfected Lady thereby unified the four lineages into one. Later, she resided in the Golden Watchtower’s Illuminating Brilliance Palace, presiding over the Cavernous Illumination Mansion, the Golden Watchtower’s Illuminating Dao Palace atop Mount Linong, and the Golden Watchtower’s Central Numinous Congealment Illumination Mansion.

**The Jasper Chamber’s Inner Response, Cavernous Clarity’s Supreme Effulgence Perfected Lady**, Guo Yulong.
A native of the capital, she served as the Azure Mystery’s Supreme Radiance Attendant, presiding over the Purple Clarity Mansion and the Cavernous Clarity Mansion.

**The Purple Radiance’s Illuminating Perfected, Blessing Harmony Perfected Lady**, Fu Yangyu, styled Zifang.
The Three Heavens’ Supreme Assistant, residing in the Flourishing Brilliance Mansion of Mount Linong, and also said to dwell on the Oceanic Peaks’ Grand Flower Mountain, presiding over the Dragon Radiance Mansion.

**The Dragon Radiance’s Dao Illumination Perfected Lady**, Yao Zhuang, styled Shuqi.
A native of the Western Capital, also titled the Vast Prosperity Perfected Lady. The Three Heavens’ Scripture Attendant, residing in the Vast Mulberry’s Harmonious Impulse Palace, presiding over the Prosperous Blessing Mansion, traveling between two or three abodes.

**The Celestial Clarity’s Wondrous Transformation, Purple Essence’s Jade Brilliance Perfected Lady**, Gao Shuang.
Residing at the mouth of Weishan Valley in Yanjing, she served as the Three Heavens’ Attendant, presiding over the Vast Mulberry Mountain’s Cavernous Radiance Prosperity Mansion and the Jade Brilliance’s Illuminating Congealment Mansion, with three dwelling places.

**The Meritorious August Numinous Lady**, Quan Mao.
The Harmonious Yang’s Perfected Attendant, presiding over the Harmonious Yang Palace.

**The Western Flower’s Pure Emptiness Perfected**, Hua Ying.
A native of Fengxiang Prefecture, born on the third day of the first lunar month, she served as the Cavernous Yang’s Supreme Minister of the Azure Mystery’s Illuminating Primordial Immortal Court, residing on Mount Western Flower.

**The Green City’s Penetrating Blessing Perfected**, Zhu Dongyuan.
A native of Chengdu, born on the first day of the second lunar month, he served as the Divine Empyrean’s Jade Pivot Envoy of the Azure Mystery’s Cavernous Guard Supreme Minister, secluded on Mount Green City.

**The Cloud Mountain’s Preserving Unity Perfected**, Li Shaowei.
A native of Fangzhou, born on the fifth day of the third lunar month, he served as the Five Thunders’ Institute Envoy of the Azure Mystery’s Capital Primordial Right Minister, secluded on Mount Green City.

**The Eyebrow Mountain’s Reclusive Perfected**, Nan Bidao, styled Douwen.
The Azure Mystery’s Preserving Primordial Immortal Minister, a native of Meizhou, born at the hour of Yin on the third day of the eleventh lunar month in the Bingchen year in Meishan. Indifferent to fame and profit, his learning bridged heaven and humanity. Serving the Song, he rose to the position of Guangxi’s Provincial Governor. Once, he encountered the Preserving Unity Perfected, who bestowed upon him the Supreme Dao, enabling him to command spirits and deities. One day, a crimson-robed official descended into his courtyard and addressed the Perfected: "The Emperor has heard of your name and now appoints you as the Six Penetrations’ Controller of Waters in the Dipper. You are to propagate the mysterious teachings and broadly deliver living beings. When your merit is complete, you shall be summoned back to the Golden Watchtower." With these words, the crimson-robed official ascended into the sky. He secluded himself on Mount Green City.

**The Azure Waters’ Thunder Abyss Perfected**, Huang Shunshen, styled Huibo.
A native of Jianning, born at the hour of Wei on the fifth day of the intercalary eighth lunar month in the Jiachen year. Precociously intelligent, he perused all books of the Three Teachings and Nine Schools. While accompanying his father on official duties in Guangxi, the Provincial Governor, the Reclusive Perfected of Eyebrow Mountain, saw him and marveled, entrusting him with all his writings.

chunks.original_text: 先生钩玄探赜，集成大全，登门之士，冠盖如云。 中膺召命入觐，继得旨还山，隐居紫霞洲之上，为一世宗师云。 道法驱疑说 道家之行持，即儒家格物之学也。 盖行持以正心诚意为主，心不正则不足以感物，意不诚则不足以通神。 神 运於此，物应於彼。 故虽万里，可呼吸於咫尺之间，非至诚孰能与於此。 呜呼。 广大无际者，心也。 隔碍潜通者，神也。 然心不存，则不明。 神不养，则不灵。 正以存之久而自明，诚以养之久而自灵。 世之学者，不务操履於平时，而遽施行於一旦，亦犹汲甘泉於枯井，采奇华於枯木，吾见其不得矣。 及其气索神惊，取侮致慢，乃归咎於神之不灵，法之不验，良可悲也。 时师不达深妙，持祭将则灵之说，以愚后人。 遂 使后学一意祭赛，损物伤生，引召无倚，求食之鬼，日至月增，结成徒党。 自谓驱摄指挥如意，不知以邪攻邪，实有损於行持者之身也。 予自总角，心爱行持，遍传法书数箱，印几百颗，意谓法止如此。 道心坚猛，天诱其衷。 忽遇至人，授以口诀，不出数句，遂纵横於诸法中。 方知将吏，只在身中，神明不离方寸。 世之志尚清高，雅意行道法者，不可不知此理也。 灵宝大斋醮法 混洞既分，列为三洞，别名三天，以号三宝。 洞真清微天宝，帝也。 洞玄禹余灵宝，洞神大赤神宝，皆臣也。 所以仰遵元始之宗，以演清微之道，故出书。 灵宝玉晨道君，生於西那玉国，由兹凤检龙章，来传人世。 厥后太极真人下临左宫仙翁，应运太清，化治正一，相承万端千条，神圣继作，云灵宝内旨。 总日始青大斋法，行始青门下分司事。 又曰灵宝斋法，行黄箓院分司事。 又曰灵宝大法司。 官府总曰元始运玄宫，内分二十四府曰：元罗梵景府，元罗太霞府，元罗太明府，元罗太元府，元罗太华府，神元紫皇府，神元紫清府，神元紫瑶府，神元紫琼府，神元紫昌府，大梵丹灵府，大梵丹晖府，大梵丹元府，大梵丹景府，大梵丹仙府，紫元景曜府，紫元景华府，紫元景复府，紫元景枢府，紫元景丰府，灵元昭应府，灵元昭丹府，元英紫璇府，元英紫玑府。 斋品曰：太一斋。 帝王配天十神，太一主之。 九天斋。 福国安民，九皇天帝主之。 金箓斋。 帝王安图家，上元天官主之。 玉箓斋。 保佑六宫，中元地官主之。 黄箓斋。 帝主后妃士，庶，迁被通用，下元水官主之。 又分三元同主。 明真斋。 迁拔亡殁，三元同主之。 洞渊斋。 解禳疫疠，北帝主之。 九幽斋。 拔度亡段，九幽天尊主之。 五炼斋。 道士迁神行之，九幽天尊主之。 已上谓之九品斋科。 章书经箓简诰符檄品 灵宝飞神上仙玉章。 正斋一日，晚朝拜。 章信。 章函符。 封式。 引进笺申。 通阙符。 拜章召章神符。 顶带符。 佩印。 九台篆。 伏章出官符。 宣章，操章。 熨章仪式。 封章。 遣章。 焚章拜伏符法。 紫宸神运束极青玄升神玉书。 引进笺书信捷奏递符。 元始策灵生神洞经。 引进笺经信符式并同。 此经普度道俗祖先师资，不与前书混拜。 灵宝阳华金科生升黄箓。 普度给付亡魂。 灵宝混洞升真黄录。 常醮给付亡魂。 无上明真玉匮飞神黄箓。 告行普度给亡通用。 无上昭云摄景通真玉匮黄录。 给付亡魂。 灵宝玄都玉京宝录。 炼度聚形用。

The Master delved into mysteries and probed profundities, compiling them into a comprehensive compendium. Scholars flocked to his gate, their caps and carriages like clouds. Later, he was summoned to court, then received the imperial decree to return to the mountains. He secluded himself upon Purple Radiance Isle, becoming the preeminent master of his age.

**On Daoist Practices and Resolving Doubts**
Daoist cultivation is akin to the Confucian study of investigating things. For in practice, rectifying the mind and sincerity of intent are paramount. If the mind is not rectified, it cannot move things; if intent is not sincere, it cannot communicate with spirits. When spirit operates here, things respond there. Thus, though separated by a thousand miles, one may breathe as if face-to-face—who but the utterly sincere can achieve this?

Alas! Vast and boundless is the mind; subtly interconnected is the spirit. Yet if the mind is not preserved, it remains unclear; if the spirit is not nurtured, it lacks efficacy. Only through long preservation does clarity arise; only through long nurturance does efficacy manifest. Scholars of this world, neglecting daily cultivation, rush to act in a single moment—like drawing sweet water from a dry well or plucking rare blossoms from withered wood. I see they shall not succeed. When their qi is exhausted and their spirit startled, inviting scorn and disdain, they then blame the spirit’s inefficacy or the method’s failure—how lamentable!

Some masters, failing to grasp these profound mysteries, cling to the notion that rituals and sacrifices alone invoke efficacy, thereby misleading later generations. Consequently, disciples focus solely on offerings and sacrifices, harming creatures and wasting life. They summon wandering, food-seeking ghosts, whose numbers grow daily, forming factions. Claiming to command and control spirits at will, they do not realize that using evil to attack evil truly harms the practitioner’s own body.

From my youth, I cherished cultivation, collecting several chests of ritual texts and hundreds of seals, believing these were the extent of the methods. Yet my resolve was firm, and Heaven guided my heart. Suddenly, I encountered a perfected one who transmitted oral instructions—no more than a few phrases—and I roamed freely among all methods. Only then did I realize that generals and officials reside within the body, and the divine does not depart from the square inch of the heart. Those of noble aspirations who earnestly seek the Dao and its methods must not be ignorant of this principle.

**The Great Libation Rites of the Numinous Treasure**
When the Primal Chaos divided, it formed the Three Caverns, also called the Three Heavens, designating the Three Treasures. The Cavern of Reality is the Heaven of Pure Tenuity, the Treasure of the Dao, ruled by the Emperor. The Cavern of Mystery is the Heaven of Jade Clarity, the Numinous Treasure, and the Cavern of Divinity is the Heaven of Great Vermilion, the Divine Treasure—both governed by ministers. Thus, they reverently follow the origin of the Primordial Beginning to expound the Dao of Pure Tenuity, producing scriptures.

The Lord of the Dao of Jade Clarity of the Numinous Treasure was born in the Western Jade Kingdom of Na. From there, phoenix-inscribed decrees and dragon-script edicts were transmitted to the human world. Later, the Perfected of the Great Ultimate descended to the Left Palace Immortal Elder, responding to the era of the Grand Purity. Transforming and governing the Orthodox Unity, they passed down myriad methods—sacred and divine—forming the *Inner Essentials of the Numinous Treasure*.

Collectively called the *Great Libation Rites of the Primordial Azure*, they are practiced under the Primordial Azure Gate’s Branch Office. Also termed the *Numinous Treasure Libation Rites*, they are administered by the Yellow Register Court’s Branch Office. Additionally, they are known as the *Bureau of the Great Numinous Treasure*. The overarching institution is the *Palace of the Primordial’s Mysterious Workings*, which encompasses twenty-four bureaus:

- **Yellow Register Libation**: Benefits the emperor, empress, officials, and commoners; universally applicable; presided over by the Water Official of the Lower Primordial. Alternatively, all Three Primordials may preside jointly.
- **Illuminating Perfection Libation**: Delivers the deceased; jointly presided over by the Three Primordials.
- **Cavern Abyss Libation**: Dispels epidemics; presided over by the Northern Emperor.

- **Five Refinements Libation**: Practiced by Daoists for spiritual ascension; presided over by the Heavenly Worthy of the Nine Darks.

The above are the nine grades of libation rituals.

This scripture universally delivers the ancestors and masters of Daoists and laity; it is not to be mixed with the preceding texts in worship.

chunks.original_text: 元景丹天飞天神驿法 章式 灵宝飞神上仙玉章 用好七尺札纸，详事意，或用三幅，或五幅七幅。 每行一十七字，如大钱大，单行止。 前空一尺九寸，书符分作四行。 清 真 招 集 飞 神 上 仙 总 摄 传 玄 妙 化 通 天 具位臣姓某。 臣闻无所不度丕彰大梵之文，绝而得生，昭示飞神之旨。 臣谨奏，为某路州县具官某人，偕同会众信等。 切念荣枯代谢，生死轮回。 上叩天阍，俾心词而洞达。 下通地垒，希滞类以迁升。 谨沥蚁忱，仰干鸿造，适逢望日，幸际中元。 建真境之瑶坛，开寥阳之宝殿。 斋崇黄录，科演清微。 某日预备告盟，潜通六合。 某日正奏捆诚，请祈恩命。 玉历颁行，灵符宣告，摄追魂爽，遍达幽冥。 某日坚立宸磨，分司立幕，进表启玄，卷帘谒圣，金锺迭奏，玉磬交呜，光彻三晨，音闻九陛。 某日三宣科范，鼎上词言，是夜进拜玉章，上祈宸御，破狱召亡，锡衣咒食。 某日三上青词，重宣玄范，是夜普炼沉滞幽囚苦爽，陶魂铸魄，复性生真，给符度箓，证果超升。 某日三时； 朝奏重启词言，玉符炼质，金箓超神。 牍再叩，以言功 意，复称而告简。 次日解坛散席，昭答宸恩。 满散修设，三界高真，清醮一座，集慈殊利。 上祝皇帝万岁，太子千龄，预会同盟，均覃景贶。 臣谨因泓清宫直妙炁万神。 臣克以今良辰，伏地拜进，元降灵宝飞神上仙玉章，仰祈超度伏取敕旨。 右臣谨诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，斋沐裁牍，上奏上清大帝灵宝天尊玉陛下。 臣恭望大道天慈，允臣所奏，肆颁敕旨，降付三省，宣布中元，清虚地官，即使普告三界，遍示十方。 拔度预会，附荐祖祢远亡近死内外宗亲，神识普及沉滞幽爽。 乘兹道力，咸遂超升。 仰祈覃宥，均拜 洪恩。 臣冒渎，天威，下情不胜战栗，局天蹐地，俯伏以闻。 谨奏。 太岁年月日具位臣姓某上奏 可漏 灵宝飞神上仙玉章具位臣姓某谨封 外函 谨谨上诣 具位臣姓某谨重封 上清玄都玉京七宝紫微官请进 函中符 用青纸，高三寸，阔一寸半，朱书，安函内。 上 奏 臣某 章信安函内。 朱砂半两重，脑子半两重，青丝十二条，各长丈二。 如仪入木函，内贴符，如后式。 封讫，再入护封，以黄罗袱包，置於章案。 木函如式，贴符讫。 函上雕三印窠，留横直线道。 以五色线直至，上缠八匝一结，又中缠八匝横一结，又下缠八匝一结。 结封横结，从上至下煞封。 此按二十四府三部八景，缚结时心念二十四府天尊圣号三部至真，一匝一句。 然后用印三处，封如式。 木函内贴符 护封 谨上诣

**Method of the Primordial Radiance’s Celestial Flight-Divine Courier: Ritual Formulary for the Lingbao Jade Chapters of Flying Spirits and Ascended Immortals**

Use fine seven-foot memorial paper, specifying the matter in detail. Employ either three, five, or seven sheets. Each line shall contain seventeen characters, the size of a large coin, in single columns only. Leave a blank space of one foot nine inches at the top, then inscribe the talisman in four rows:

**Pure**
**Perfected**
**Summon**
**Assemble**
**Flying Spirits**
**Ascended Immortals**
**Comprehensively**
**Gather**
**Transmit**
**Mysterious**
**Wondrous**
**Transformations**
**Communicating with Heaven**

*[Your] subordinate, [Name] of such-and-such rank, humbly states:*

I have heard that the great Brahmā’s scriptures, which deliver all without exception, reveal the means to transcend extinction and attain rebirth, and manifest the intent of the Flying Spirits. Your subordinate respectfully memorializes on behalf of [Name], an official of [such-and-such] prefecture, commandery, and county, together with the assembled faithful.

We deeply reflect upon the vicissitudes of glory and decay, the revolving wheel of life and death. Above, we knock upon the gates of heaven, that our heartfelt words may penetrate profoundly. Below, we communicate with the earthly prisons, hoping that the stagnant and bound may ascend. Humbly pouring forth our sincerest devotion, we beseech Your August Majesty. Fortuitously coinciding with the full moon and the Zhongyuan Festival, we establish a jade altar in the realm of the Perfected and open the jeweled palace of the Liao-Yang Heaven. We uphold the Yellow Register fast, perform the rites of the Qingwei tradition, and prepare for the covenant on [such-and-such] day, secretly communicating with the Six Directions. On [such-and-such] day, we formally present our bound sincerity, beseeching the grace of Your mandate. The Jade Almanac is issued, the numinous talismans proclaimed, summoning and delivering the souls of the deceased, reaching throughout the netherworld.

On [such-and-such] day, we erect the imperial millstone, establish the bureaus and tents, present memorials to the Mysterious, roll up the curtains to pay homage to the Sage, strike the golden bells in succession, and sound the jade chimes in harmony. The light illumines the Three Mornings, and the music resounds through the Nine Palaces.

On [such-and-such] day, we thrice proclaim the ritual codes, present words at the tripod, and that night offer the Jade Chapters, supplicating the imperial throne to break open the prisons, summon the deceased, bestow vestments, and enchant the food.

On [such-and-such] day, we thrice present the Green Petitions, reiterate the Mysterious Codes, and that night universally refine the sunken, stagnant, imprisoned, and suffering souls. We smelt the hun and cast the po, restore their nature and engender their Perfected, grant talismans and deliver registers, certify their fruition, and enable their transcendence and ascent.

During the Tianbao era of the Tang, wooden prayer tablets were replaced with plain petitions written on paper.

The form of a petition should be substantive rather than ornate,
unadorned rather than refined,
plain rather than florid,
true rather than false,
direct rather than circuitous,
persuasive rather than verbose,
